long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets your default search engine and homepage to hyperDart. 

hyperDart is reimagining search through the lens of experts. 

When you search with hyperDart, you will see smart cards (called “darts”) powered by our network of high quality information providers in addition to standard web search results. You will find answers to your queries faster, and you’ll spend less time hopping from link to link. 

Search with hyperDart to navigate the richness of the web with less clutter, and easily find information from the sources you trust the most. 

More about hyperDart
